{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Tenda |model=Mesh3 |revision=-18 (Nova MW6 2018) |series=AC1200 |fcc_date=05/09/2018 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |type=wireless system |fcc_id=V7TMESH3-18 |pcb_id=10036267 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Realtek |cpu1_model=RTL8197FS |cpu1_cspeed=1 GHz |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model= |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Realtek |ram1_model=RTL8197FS |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model=RTL8197FS |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi2_chip1_model=RTL8812BRH;RTL8812BRH, HC159P1 GH52; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Realtek |sw_model=RTL8363NB;RTL8363NB, H8S52G2 GH38; |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports=1 |flags=Wave2, MU-MIMO, Alexa |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=NOVA_XXXX }}
:• '''867''' Mbps - 2SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''300''' Mbps - 2SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan.) = '''''1200 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|AC1200 Whole Home Mesh WiFi System}} :{{ProductPage|http://www.tendacn.com/en/product/MW6.html}} "10036267" and "V2.1" is silkscreened on the main board in the FCC photos. The CPU is not shown in the FCC internal photos but it is assumed to be :a [[Realtek]] RTL8197FS like in the original [[Tenda Mesh3 (Nova MW6)]]. May also be referred to by the model name '''Nova MW6''' just like the original [[Tenda Mesh3 (Nova MW6)|Mesh3]]. ===See also=== :[[List of Wireless Systems#Tenda Nova]] *[[Tenda nova MW5 (Mesh5s)|Tenda Mesh5s]] - AC1200 Whole Home Mesh WiFi System :FCC ID: V7TMESH5S (2018-07-20) *[[Tenda nova MW5 (Mesh5)|Tenda Mesh5]] - AC1200 Whole Home Mesh WiFi System :FCC ID: V7TMESH5 (2018-07-19) *[[Tenda Mesh3-18 (Nova MW6 2018)|Tenda Mesh3s-18]] - AC1200 Whole Home Mesh WiFi System :FCC ID: V7TMESH3-18 (2018-05-09) *[[Tenda Mesh3f]] - AC1200 Whole Home Mesh WiFi System :FCC ID: V7TMESH3F (2018-05-02) *[[Tenda Mesh3s]] - AC1200 Whole Home Mesh WiFi System :FCC ID: V7TMESH3S (2018-01-24) *[[Tenda Mesh3]] - AC1200 Whole Home Mesh WiFi System :FCC ID: V7TMESH3 (2017-08-23) __NOTOC__
